Name: Chisong
Village_Settlement: There are about 400 people living in Chisong village.
Surname_Groups: Surnames include the Lin 林, Niu 牛, and Zheng 郑, of which the Lin makes up 80% of the entire population.
Village_Temples: Zhaoling xinshê 昭灵新社 is located in Mazhukeng 马竹坑.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/17–19, Yuanxiao 元宵 is celebrated.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 5/16: The birthdays of gods are celebrated together. Opera is performed for two days. One Daoist ritual master 师公 is invited to conduct rites.
